item.title: Arno Bosse on "Regarding better solution towards building a forum related to elder care"
item.dc:creator: Arno Bosse
item.description:
Replying to @earchsvc11@gmail.com's post:

You might also want to look at BuddyPress.

item.title: earchsvc11@gmail.com on "Regarding better solution towards building a forum related to elder care"
item.dc:creator: earchsvc11@gmail.com
item.description:
I intend to build a forum/community related to elder care.
The end users would typically use this as a support tool for QA, collaborate with others and also be able to link to various associated systems.
I did consider Drupal for the solution. Are there other options that I should be looking at?
